attributes.action: Right to openly carry a sword
attributes.additional_details:
In celebration of Britain's exceptional military heritage I feel that it is the right of every Briton to openly carry a sword. This will allow us to fight off foreign invaders as we have countless times.

I propose that this should extend to battleaxes, cudgels falchions and of course maces.

In addition to this I propose that we reinstate mandatory longbow practice for all men.
